item.title: 20 miles Speed Sign plate required on this road, 4th August
item.description:
There are no speed sign plates installed along this road . Only seen 20 as a speed limit marked on the surface. I imagine it should be also metal sign plates displayed on the poles to minimise speeding and I haven't seen any on Royal Hopital Road.going past the museum towards the river.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Hospital Road, Chelsea, London
Report on FixMyStreet
